metadata.title: RHSA-2021:2258: rh-nginx118-nginx security update (Important)
metadata.description:
nginx is a web and proxy server supporting HTTP and other protocols, with a focus on high concurrency, performance, and low memory usage. 

Security Fix(es):

* nginx: Off-by-one in ngx_resolver_copy() when labels are followed by a pointer to a root domain name (CVE-2021-23017)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: nginx: Off-by-one in ngx_resolver_copy() when labels are followed by a pointer to a root domain name

platform: Red Hat Software Collections for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7
Red Hat Software Collections for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.7 EUS
